text: You get out of bed, shower, brush your teeth, and walk to class.
You walk downstairs to the dining court and run into your friend Stephen
You ignore Stephen, grab some food and sit down to eat.
A cute girl walks by and catches your eye
You see your friend Stephen and strike up conversation.
"Hey check out that girl standing over there. What do you think?"
You make your way towards the Class of 1951 Lecture Hall.
